mapper.select: SELECT po.output_code AS output_code, po.output_name AS output_name, po.output_user AS output_user, po.output_date AS output_date, pot.output_type AS output_type_name, pt.task_code AS task_code, pt.task_name AS task_name FROM project_outputs po INNER JOIN project_output_types pot ON pot.output_type_code = po.output_type_code INNER JOIN project_tasks pt ON pt.task_code = po.task_code INNER JOIN project_task_groups ptg ON pt.taskGroup_code = ptg.taskGroup_code INNER JOIN projects p ON p.project_code = ptg.project_code WHERE p.project_code = #{projectCode}

SELECT po.*, ptt.output_type AS output_type_name FROM project_outputs po INNER JOIN project_tasks pt ON po.task_code = pt.task_code INNER JOIN project_output_types ptt ON po.output_type_code = ptt.output_type_code WHERE pt.task_code = #{taskCode} ORDER BY ptt.output_type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_outputs(output_code, output_name, output_user, output_date, output_path, output_type_code, task_code) VALUES(ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{outputName}, #{outputUser}, (SELECT sysdate FROM dual), #{outputPath}, #{outputTypeCode}, #{taskCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE project_outputs SET output_name = #{outputName}, output_user = #{outputUser}, output_path = #{outputPath}, output_type_code = #{outputTypeCode}, task_code = #{taskCode} WHERE output_code = #{outputCode}
